body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarDealz support. My name is Eric Jones and I am here to assist you. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Brenda Campbell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Brenda. Could you please provide me with your contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five - two zero zero - eight one nine three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Brenda. One more thing, could you provide me with your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Thank you for sharing your information, Brenda. Is there anything else you would like to address today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I'm feeling relieved now. Thank you for your help, Eric.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Brenda. I'm glad we could assist you. Feel free to reach out to us if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
